name: ecobalyse
description: Accélérer l'affichage environnemental de la filière textile française
author: Ecobalyse <contact@beta.gouv.fr>

scripts.build: npm run server:build && rimraf dist && npm run build:init && parcel build index.html --public-url ./
scripts.build:init: ./bin/update-version.sh && mkdir -p dist && cp -r public/* dist/ && npm run db:build
scripts.build:standalone-app: npm run build && npm run server:build && cp server-app.js dist/ && cp openapi.yaml dist/
scripts.lint:ruff:all: npm run lint:ruff:check && npm run lint:ruff:format
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:prettier:all && npm run lint:ruff:all && npm run lint:openapi
scripts.fix:ruff:all: npm run fix:ruff:check && npm run fix:ruff:format
scripts.fix:all: npm run fix:ruff:all && npm run fix:prettier:all
scripts.format:json: npx prettier@3.0.3 --write . && pipenv run ruff check --select I --fix && pipenv run ruff format
scripts.server:build: npm run db:build && elm make src/Server.elm --optimize --output=server-app.js
scripts.server:dev: npm run server:build && nodemon server.js --config nodemon.json
scripts.server:debug: elm make src/Server.elm --output=server-app.js && nodemon server.js --config nodemon.json
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && pipenv run ./update.sh && pipenv run ./manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8002
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:init && concurrently -k -n "parcel,server,backend" -c "green,cyan,yellow" "npm run start:parcel" "npm run server:dev" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.test:client: NODE_ENV=test npm run db:build && npx elm-test
scripts.test:server-ci: concurrently -k -s first -n "django,test" "npm run start:backend" "while ! lsof -i:8002; do sleep 1; done && npm run server:build && jest"
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:backend && npm run test:server
